attributes.action: Reforn social housing tenancies so that greater use is made short term tenancies to free up the social housing stock in line with John Hills' recommendations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In line with John Hills' recommendations this year, the Government should begin to look at ways that social housing tenancies can be changed so that tenants are encouraged to leave social housing when their income picks up rather than stay. Long term tenancies should only be given to those unable to make alternative provision.
